Structs/NextFlowItem.html.name: NextFlowItem
Structs/NextFlowItem.html.abstract: A NextFlowItem is the result of the coordination action between a Flow and a Step (See Flow.navigate(to:) function)

Protocols/Stepper.html#/s:6RxFlow7Steppe.name: steps
Protocols/Stepper.html#/s:6RxFlow7Steppe.abstract: The Observable corresponding to the Steps triggered by the Stepper

Protocols/Stepper.html#/s:6RxFlow7Steppe.name: step
Protocols/Stepper.html#/s:6RxFlow7Steppe.abstract: The step Subject in which to publish new Steps

Protocols/Presentable.html#/s:6RxFlow11P.name: rxVisible
Protocols/Presentable.html#/s:6RxFlow11P.abstract: Rx Observable that triggers a bool indicating if the current Presentable is being displayed (applies to UIViewController, Warp or UIWindow for instance)

Protocols/Presentable.html#/s:6RxFlow11P.name: rxFirstTimeVisible
Protocols/Presentable.html#/s:6RxFlow11P.abstract: Rx Observable (Single trait) triggered when this presentable is displayed for the first time

Protocols/Presentable.html#/s:6RxFlow11P.name: rxDismissed
Protocols/Presentable.html#/s:6RxFlow11P.abstract: Rx Observable (Single trait) triggered when this presentable is dismissed

Protocols/Flow.html#/s:6RxFlow0B0P8navig.name: navigate(to:)

Protocols/Flow.html#/s:6RxFlow0B0P4rootA.abstract: the Presentable on which rely the navigation inside this Flow. This method must always give the same instance

Protocols/Flow.html.name: Flow
Protocols/Flow.html.abstract: A Flow defines a clear navigation area. Combined to a Step it leads to a navigation action

Protocols/HasDisposeBag.html.name: HasDisposeBag
Protocols/HasDisposeBag.html.abstract: Each HasDisposeBag offers a unique Rx DisposeBag instance

Protocols/Presentable.html.name: Presentable
Protocols/Presentable.html.abstract: An abstraction of what can present a Loom. For now, UIViewControllers, Warps are Presentable

Protocols.html#/s:6RxFlow4StepP.name: Step
Protocols.html#/s:6RxFlow4StepP.abstract: A Step describes a possible state of navigation insie a Flow

Protocols/Stepper.html.name: Stepper
Protocols/Stepper.html.abstract: a Stepper has only one purpose is: emits Steps that correspond to specific navigation states.

Protocols.html#/s:6RxFlow14Synchronizabl.name: Synchronizable
Protocols.html#/s:6RxFlow14Synchronizabl.abstract: Provides a function to prevent concurrent block execution

Extensions/ObservableType.html#/s:7RxSwi.name: pausable(withPauser:)
Extensions/ObservableType.html#/s:7RxSwi.abstract: Pauses the elements of the source observable sequence based on the latest element from the second observable sequence.

Extensions/ObservableType.html#/s:7RxSwi.name: pausable(afterCount:withPauser:)
Extensions/ObservableType.html#/s:7RxSwi.abstract: Pauses the elements of the source observable sequence based on the latest element from the second observable sequence.

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: willNavigate
Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.abstract: Rx Observable triggered before the Coordinator navigates a Flow/Step

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: didNavigate

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: firstTimeViewDidAppear

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: dismissed
Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.abstract: Rx observable, triggered when the view is being dismissed

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: displayed

Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.name: windowDidAppear
Extensions/Reactive.html#/s:7RxSwift8Rea.abstract: Rx Single that is triggered once the UIWindow is displayed

Enums/NextFlowItems.html#/s:6RxFlow04Nex.name: multiple
Enums/NextFlowItems.html#/s:6RxFlow04Nex.abstract: a Flow will trigger several NextFlowItem at the same time for the same Step

Enums/NextFlowItems.html#/s:6RxFlow04Nex.name: one
Enums/NextFlowItems.html#/s:6RxFlow04Nex.abstract: a Flow will trigger only one NextFlowItem for a Step

Enums/NextFlowItems.html#/s:6RxFlow04Nex.name: end
Enums/NextFlowItems.html#/s:6RxFlow04Nex.abstract: a Flow will trigger a special NextFlowItem that represents the dismissal of this Flow

Enums/NextFlowItems.html#/s:6RxFlow04Nex.name: triggerParentFlow
Enums/NextFlowItems.html#/s:6RxFlow04Nex.abstract: a Flow will trigger a special NextFlowItem that allows to trigger a new Step for the parent Flow (same as .end but without stopping listening for child flow steppers)

Enums/NextFlowItems.html#/s:6RxFlow04Nex.name: none
Enums/NextFlowItems.html#/s:6RxFlow04Nex.abstract: no further navigation will be triggered for a Step
